pullrequest.title: New VRC Textures from Thomas and Maurice (redone to fix merges)

content.raw: Yea, that was my intention. I ended up not using them because the texture got stretched too much ... just realized that that was because the texture had the wrong orientation though. Can you rotate the cinder block texture by 90 degrees and either use it instead of on of the other textures (brick looks kinda bad as it ignores texture scale and maps the full texture onto each side for some reason which makes the bricks very small) or as an additional one.
content.html: Yea, that was my intention. I ended up not using them because the texture got stretched too much ... just realized that that was because the texture had the wrong orientation though. Can you rotate the cinder block texture by 90 degrees and either use it instead of on of the other textures (brick looks kinda bad as it ignores texture scale and maps the full texture onto each side for some reason which makes the bricks very small) or as an additional one.
